record.field: Getting a 'ModuleNotFoundError: no module named xyz_custom_report' in the custom Python script responsible for generating the monthly sales report. This started immediately after applying the latest Odoo patch yesterday evening. This is blocking our month-end closing process, need an urgent fix before EOD tomorrow.
Printer Jamming Issue - 3rd Floor East Wing

The network printer (identified as PRN-EAST-3F, model HP LaserJet Pro M404dn) in the East Wing on the 3rd floor keeps jamming repeatedly. We've tried clearing the paper path following the on-screen instructions and checked the paper type, but the issue recurs after printing just 2-3 pages. It's not stopping critical work, but it's causing disruption for the marketing team.
Slow Network Access - London Office Shared Drive

Multiple users (~20 people) in the London office are reporting extremely slow access times when trying to open or save files on the main shared network drive (\LON-FS01\Shared). This started about an hour ago (around 9:00 AM GMT). Internet access seems fine, it's specific to the file server. This is significantly impacting productivity for the affected teams.
